Name: A Moustache in the House 2
About the game: Story A Moustache in the House 2 continues the events from the first. This time the player gets captured and trapped inside Moustache's house. Fortunately the House AI (Maria) wants to escape the house as much as the player, so she helps finding a way out. Gameplay -Hide from Moustache's minions -Fight against bosses -Use gadgets to get through certain obstacles and defeat certain enemies -Get through terrifying jumping puzzles -Escape from the house
